title: Install ros-mcp-server for ROS 2 MCP integration
description: Integrate ros-mcp-server to enable Claude Code to interact with the ROS 2 simulation via MCP. Steps: (1) Add rosbridge_server to Docker image, (2) Add rosbridge launch to docker-compose, (3) Configure ros-mcp-server as MCP server for Claude Code via .mcp.json, (4) Document usage.
close_reason: Added rosbridge_server to Dockerfile, rosbridge service to docker-compose, and .mcp.json for Claude Code MCP integration
